animeDescription: Promotion video for Kazuma Ootorino's light novel Ryuugajou Nanana no Maizoukin, commissioned by Enterbrain after Ootorino won the 13th Entertainment Awards Grand Prize (Entame Taishou) from the publisher's light novel department.
animeRelated: ['Ryuugajou Nanana no Maizoukin', 'Ryuugajou Nanana no Maizoukin (TV)']
animeCharacters: ['Ryuugajou, Nanana', 'Yama, Juugo', 'Ikkyuu, Tensai', 'Hoshino, Daruku', 'Yuiga, Isshin', 'Ibara, Yuu']
animeStaff: [['Aka Ringo', ['Original Character Design']], ['Shimizu Yumi', ['Character Design']], ['Ootorino Kazuma', ['Original Creator']], ['Okazaki Masaharu', ['Director of Photography']]]
